subject: X Games
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Shaun White won his sixth-straight halfpipe gold medal at the Winter X Games with a score of 98 out of 100, including one trick that topped out at a record 24 feet above the edge of the halfpipe.
snippet: Shaun White won his sixth-straight halfpipe gold medal at the Winter X Games with a score of 98 out of 100, including one trick that topped out at a record 24 feet above the edge of the halfpipe.
